content.rendered:
Jiliaaa Roma X is an online slot game that takes players on a journey to ancient Rome, where they can experience the glory and grandeur of the Roman Empire. The game features impressive graphics and animations, as well as a variety of symbols related to ancient Rome, such as gladiators, chariots, and the Colosseum. Players can spin the reels to try and land winning combinations of symbols, which can trigger payouts and bonus features. The game also includes a progressive jackpot, which can award players with massive payouts if they are lucky enough to hit the jackpot. Overall, Jiliaaa Roma X is a thrilling slot game that combines history and entertainment, providing players with an immersive and exciting gaming experience.

Roma X Game Rules

Romax Slot Machine is a popular slot machine that has been created by JILI gaming. The game has a play style that is quite similar to slotxo’s Roma, such as various symbols that gives a familiar feeling including the free spins feature And as a bonus we have to fight the lions in the Colosseum. The MAX BONUS multiplier is 500X.

  • Bet line wins pay if in succession starting from the leftmost reel to right according to paytable.
  • Only the biggest payout is considered for each payline.
  • Winnings = (Bet x Pay)/15.

Roma X Special Symbols

  •  Represent any icons in the game (except  icon)

Roma X Bonus Game

  • In a main game, when three BONUS icons appears on the win line, a bonus game can be triggered.
  • In each round of bonus game, 1 stamina is deducted when fighter takes damage. The bonus game will end when stamina = 0.
  • During each fight, choose from 3 options to randomly get dual swords, single sword or lion.
  • Attack the lion or defend from lion’s attacks to win rewards (lion has the chance to evade fighters’s attack).
  • Attack the lion or defend from lion’s attacks to win rewards (lion has the chance to evade fighter’s attack)
    Dual swords – Bet x 20.
    Single sword – Bet x 10.
    Lion – Bet x 3.

Free Spin

  • Get a free game by clearing 4 or more in the same round of the main game.
  • Get 3, 5, 10 and 20 free games by clearning 4, 5, 6 and 7 consecutively in the same round.
  • In a free game, you can get 3, 5, 10 and 20 free games too by clearning 4, 5, 6 and 7 in the same round.
